016package com.fns.grivet.service;
017
018import java.time.LocalDateTime;
019import java.util.List;
020import java.util.Set;
021import java.util.stream.StreamSupport;
022
023import org.json.JSONArray;
024import org.json.JSONObject;
025import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
026import org.springframework.dao.DuplicateKeyException;
027import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
028import org.springframework.transaction.annotation.Transactional;
029import org.springframework.util.Assert;
030
031import com.fns.grivet.model.Attribute;
032import com.fns.grivet.model.AttributeType;
033import com.fns.grivet.model.ClassAttribute;
034import com.fns.grivet.repo.AttributeRepository;
035import com.fns.grivet.repo.AttributeTypeRepository;
036import com.fns.grivet.repo.ClassAttributeRepository;
037import com.fns.grivet.repo.ClassRepository;
038
039@Service
040public class ClassRegistryService {
041
042        private static final String TYPE = "type";
043        private static final String DESCRIPTION = "description";
044        private static final String ATTRIBUTES = "attributes";
045
046        private final AttributeRepository attributeRepository;
047        private final AttributeTypeRepository attributeTypeRepository;
048        private final ClassRepository classRepository;
049        private final ClassAttributeRepository classAttributeRepository;
050
051        @Autowired
052        public ClassRegistryService(AttributeRepository attributeRepository,
053                        AttributeTypeRepository attributeTypeRepository, ClassRepository classRepository,
054                        ClassAttributeRepository classAttributeRepository) {
055                this.attributeRepository = attributeRepository;
056                this.attributeTypeRepository = attributeTypeRepository;
057                this.classRepository = classRepository;
058                this.classAttributeRepository = classAttributeRepository;
059        }
060
061        @Transactional
062        // USE WITH CAUTION! Consider that w/ FK, type and all related data will be destroyed
063        public void deregister(String type) {
064                com.fns.grivet.model.Class c = classRepository.findByName(type);
065                if (c != null) {
066                        classRepository.delete(c);
067                }
068        }
069
070        @Transactional
071        public String register(JSONObject payload) {
072                String type = payload.getString(TYPE);
073                String description = payload.optString(DESCRIPTION);
074                com.fns.grivet.model.Class persistentClass = classRepository.findByName(type);
075                if (persistentClass == null) {
076                        LocalDateTime createdTime = LocalDateTime.now();
077                        com.fns.grivet.model.Class detachedClass = com.fns.grivet.model.Class.builder().name(type).description(description).build();
078                        detachedClass.setCreatedTime(createdTime);
079                        persistentClass = classRepository.save(detachedClass);
080                        JSONObject attributes = payload.getJSONObject(ATTRIBUTES);
081                        Set<String> attributeNames = attributes.keySet();
082                        Assert.notEmpty(attributeNames, "[%s] must declare at least one attribute in registration request!".formatted(type));
083                        Attribute persistentAttribute = null;
084                        String at = null;
085                        AttributeType attributeType = null;
086                        // TODO create an expiring cache of attribute names for faster lookups (friendlier database use)
087                        for (String attributeName: attributeNames) {
088                                persistentAttribute = attributeRepository.findByName(attributeName);
089                                if (persistentAttribute == null) {
090                                        Attribute detachedAttribute = Attribute.builder().name(attributeName).build();
091                                        detachedAttribute.setCreatedTime(createdTime);
092                                        persistentAttribute = attributeRepository.save(detachedAttribute);
093                                }
094                                at = attributes.getString(attributeName);
095                                Assert.notNull(at, "[%s].[%s] must declare an attribute type in registration request!".formatted(type, attributeName));
096                                attributeType = attributeTypeRepository.findByType(at);
097                                Assert.notNull(attributeType, "Attribute type [%s] is not supported!".formatted(at));
098                                ClassAttribute detachedClassAttribute = 
099                                        ClassAttribute.builder()
100                                            .cid(persistentClass.getId())
101                                            .aid(persistentAttribute.getId())
102                                            .tid(attributeType.getId()).build();
103                                detachedClassAttribute.setCreatedTime(createdTime);
104                                classAttributeRepository.save(detachedClassAttribute);
105                        }
106                } else {
107                        throw new DuplicateKeyException("Type [%s] already registered!".formatted(type));
108                }
109                return type;
110        }
111
112        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
113        public JSONObject get(String type) {
114                com.fns.grivet.model.Class c = classRepository.findByName(type);
115                Assert.notNull(c, "Type [%s] is not registered!".formatted(type));
116                JSONObject result = new JSONObject();
117                result.put("type", type);
118                String description = c.getDescription();
119                result.put("description", description != null ? description: "");
120                List<ClassAttribute> cas = classAttributeRepository.findByCid(c.getId());
121                Assert.notEmpty(cas, "Type [%s] does not have any attributes registered!".formatted(type));
122                JSONObject attributes = new JSONObject();
123                result.put("attributes", attributes);
124                Attribute a = null;
125                AttributeType at = null;
126                for (ClassAttribute ca: cas) {
127            a = attributeRepository.findById(ca.getAid()).get();
128                        Assert.notNull(a, String.format("Attribute id [%s] is not registered!", ca.getAid()));
129                        at = attributeTypeRepository.findById(ca.getTid());
130                        Assert.notNull(a, String.format("Attribute Type id [%s] is not registered!", ca.getTid()));
131                        attributes.put(a.getName(), at.getType());
132                }
133                return result;
134        }
135
136        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
137        public JSONArray all() {
138                JSONArray result = new JSONArray();
139                Iterable<com.fns.grivet.model.Class> iterable = classRepository.findAll();
140                Assert.notNull(iterable, "No types are registered!");
141                StreamSupport
142                    .stream(iterable.spliterator(), false)
143                        .forEach(c -> result.put(get(c.getName())));
144                return result;
145        }
146
147}
